entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach short duration warning criteria about isolated areas. Thunderstorms possible. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria about isolated areas. Note, heavy showers and thunderstorms are possible late morning and early afternoon. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Great Barrier Island added to the Watch.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Moderate.

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places, mainly along the coast. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Great Barrier Island added to the Watch.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A cold front brings a shower or two to the road late Friday morning, possible falling as snow about the summit. Less than 1 cm may accumulate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Showers increasing during Friday morning, frequent for a time late morning, and snow lowering to 800 metres. 3 to 6 cm may accumulate on the road during late Friday morning.
